name: Night Orbit
description:
Play as a rolling orb confined to a small platform. During the day you must destroy as many enemies as possible. When night arrives they become dark and invulnerable, attempting to launch you to your doom. If you get too close to an edge you will begin to fall. Enemies that survive a whole cycle become purple and are worth more points. See just how high of a score you can get in this challenging arcade style game.

Made for the Weekly Game Jam - Week 155 with the theme "cycle."

Controls
Move with WASD, the arrow keys, by left clicking with your mouse, or with a gamepad.
